content: market day bandana a crochet pattern by ashley beals @everyday with ashley market day bandana finished size triangle shape worked top down dimensions includes ties tip to tip - 28 depth - 8 yarn and hook dk weight yarn - i used approximately 60 grams of light worsted/heavy dk weight yarn yardage approximately 150 yards hook g gauge 4 = approx 17 sts/ 13 row worked in pattern while gauge is important for the yardage requirements of this pattern you can also play with the gauge as long as you keep in mind the yardage you have available *please note that if your gauge is significantly different that mine you may have altered yardage needs * contact have questions feel free to message me on instagram @everyday with ashley or email me everydaywithashley2021@gmail com abbreviations and special stitches chain - chain st/sts - stitch/stitches skip - skip single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet double_crochet - double_crochet slip_stitch -
